markdownRemark.excerpt: Last night I decided to rewrite my blog with Gatsby. This is my first Gatsby post! Soon I’ll document the process of bringing over my Jekyll site to the Gatsby…
markdownRemark.html:
Last night I decided to rewrite my blog with Gatsby. This is my first Gatsby post!

Soon I’ll document the process of bringing over my Jekyll site to the Gatsby world :)

-Dave

frontmatter.title: My blog: now with Gatsby!
